snippet: The leaders of a military coup in Mali went on state television to assure residents of the capital, Bamako, that an outbreak of fighting there had been contained.
abstract: The leaders of a military coup in Mali went on state television to assure residents of the capital, Bamako, that an outbreak of fighting there had been contained.

headline.main: Mali Junta Urges Calm as Fighting Flares

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
